name: PROTOWORLD PRE-ALPHA FEEDBACK DEMO V1.0
description:
PROTOWORLD WILL BE A GAME WHERE YOU EXPLORE AND EAT AND GROW AND CHANGE.
PROTOWORLD WILL BE A WORLD WHERE A STAR IS FALLING.
PROTOWORLD WILL BE A STORY ABOUT CREATURES THAT DON'T UNDERSTAND.

THIS IS THE FIRST PUBLIC DEMO OF PROTOWORLD. IT AIMS TO SHOWCASE THE PLAYER MOVEMENT AND ABILITIES. THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT AND IS FAR FROM COMPLETE. PLEASE SEND ME YOUR FEEDBACK SO I CAN IMPROVE IT!

THIS IS A 3D GAME - IT MAY BE SLOWER ON OLDER MACHINES YOU CAN USE A KEYBOARD, BUT A CONTROLLER IS EASIER IF YOU ARE ON MAC, CTRL CLICK AND CHOOSE "OPEN" TO RUN
EMAIL FEEDBACK TO: FEEDBACK@PROTOWORLD.NET
WEBSITE: PROTOWORLD.NET
MY TWITTER: @PIXELATEDCROWN
